name: Thurifer
description:
Fullscreen Recommended!!!

This is my first game I ever made in Twine, and I thought I lost the files but found them again today so I thought I'd upload. It's a game that's a bit abstract and contemplative. Also there's not *many* puzzles but they're a little clunky and progressing might take a few tries.

There used to be some ambient music that went along with this piece but it's long gone. :'(

For the Global Game Jam 2016 (Theme: "Ritual")
